pullrequest.title: Workaround for avoiding a hang while using MATLAB

content.raw: I tested this branch on sides of the haptix-comm loop and saw no catastrophic failures. The Matlab hanging issue appears to be fixed. The workaround might have some negative implications later down the road but I think it's worth not crashing Matlab every time we exit.
content.html: I tested this branch on sides of the haptix-comm loop and saw no catastrophic failures. The Matlab hanging issue appears to be fixed. The workaround might have some negative implications later down the road but I think it's worth not crashing Matlab every time we exit.
